normalised: Athlete biographies offer great insight. Reading about Dhyan Chand's struggles or P T Usha's four hundred meter races at sixteen zero zero hours inspires. Perhaps include more stories from kabaddi or kho-kho, sports deeply rooted in India? Also, analysis of Ganguly's captaincy after nineteen ninety nine or Sindhu's two thousand sixteen Rio silver might interest readers. Biographies published before first january two thousand and twenty should be updated. More content from institutes like N I S Patiala appreciated.
